page.title: 15Notable Events
page.content: The most{notable event}during the year is the{Bourton Carnival}when there is a procession of floats and music from a local band. The carnival is led by a float on which the{Beauty Queen}and the{2 Princesses}stand. This is then followed by other floats which are made by different groups, for example primary schools, Hockey Club, Rugby Club and Pubs which all have a different float within a general set theme. Another event that takes place annually, each November, is the {Memorial Service}which remembers the dead of the two World Wars. It is always well attended by young and old alike. In Wyck Rissington the local people always hold a{Church Fete}in August and a similar event takes place in Bourton in July.
